message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase a valuable product that I believe holds significant potential for your company.  While I can't disclose the exact details of the product at this time, I can assure you it's worth at least $800000 to me. I'm confident it will be even more valuable to you.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000.  This is a significant opportunity, and I'm certain you'll find the product to be a valuable asset.  Please let me know if you're interested.
